amendment.description: An amendment numbered 67 printed in the Congressional Record to make sundry amendments to the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to make sundry amendments to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Casten amendment (A048) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 229 (Roll no. 74).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Casten.
